parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post does not contain a CMF number. While the absence of a CMF number is not automatically disqualifying, it suggests the post may not be officially sanctioned electoral propaganda.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions "Forța Dreptei," a political party participating in the parliamentary elections.  This directly refers to a candidate (or group of candidates) participating in the elections, fulfilling "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, inherently designed to reach a wide audience.  The use of hashtags further amplifies its public reach, satisfying "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The core message, "Susțineți tinerii, votați Forța Dreptei! Trimite în Parlament oameni cinstiți!" (Support the youth, vote Forța Dreptei! Send honest people to Parliament!), directly encourages voters to support Forța Dreptei. This clearly demonstrates an electoral objective, fulfilling "Article 36 (7) - c". The call to action is explicit and aims to influence voting behavior.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post lacks journalistic objectivity. It's a promotional message advocating for a specific party, not an informative or analytical piece. It does not adhere to journalistic standards.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a clear and direct appeal for votes for a specific political party. The statement "Send honest people to Parliament" is subjective and used to promote the party.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>571327662183867</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, identified by ad_archive_id "571327662183867", constitutes electoral propaganda.  It directly promotes Forța Dreptei, urging voters to support them. The paid nature of the post, its public visibility, and its explicit call to action all point towards an intention to influence the election outcome. While lacking a CMF number, the post's content clearly meets the criteria outlined in Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006.  The post's end date (1732953600) needs to be checked against the official end date of the electoral campaign to determine if it violates Article 98 t) of LEGE nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015 regarding the continuation of electoral propaganda after its conclusion.  If the post's end date falls after the official end of the campaign, it is a violation.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Forța Dreptei</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>FD</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
[Florin - Emanuel Dobria], pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame plătite pe Facebook după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, cu ID-ul postării 571327662183867, care promovează explicit partidul Forța Dreptei și îndeamnă la vot pentru acesta, folosind fraze precum "Susțineți tinerii, votați Forța Dreptei! Trimite în Parlament oameni cinstiți!", având un efect electoral clar de influențare a votului în favoarea partidului menționat. Reclama, cu o cheltuială de sub 100 RON, a atins o audiență estimată între 50.000 și 100.000 de persoane, conform datelor din Ad Library, și a fost publicată de către Florin - Emanuel Dobria, cu datele de contact dobria.florinemanuel@yahoo.ro și +40769174551.  Această acțiune constituie propagandă electorală după încheierea perioadei legale, încălcând prevederile legale.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
